sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
    CASE 
	    WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN RunningStatus = 'RUNNING' THEN 1 END) > 0 THEN 'running'
        WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN RunningStatus = 'FAILED' THEN 1 END) > 0 THEN 'fail'        
        WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN RunningStatus = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 END) = COUNT(*) THEN 'success'
        ELSE 'unknown'
    END AS overall_status
FROM config.Pipelines_Config where sourcecode='DSA'
and ActiveFlag='Y';

@concat('select *  FROM config.Pipelines_Config where sourcecode=','''',
pipeline().parameters.SOURCE_CODE,'''',
'and ActiveFlag=',
'''',
pipeline().parameters.FLAG,
'''')

@concat('select *  FROM config.Pipelines_Config where sourcecode=','''',
pipeline().parameters.sourcecode,'''',
'and ActiveFlag=',
'''',
pipeline().parameters.flag,
'''','AND RunningStatus=''FAILED''')

@concat('select *  FROM config.Pipelines_Config where sourcecode=','''',
pipeline().parameters.SOURCE_CODE,'''',
'and ActiveFlag=',
'''',
pipeline().parameters.FLAG,
'''','AND RunningStatus=''FAILED''')

@concat('select *  FROM config.Pipelines_Config where sourcecode=','''',
pipeline().parameters.SOURCE_CODE,'''',
'and ActiveFlag=',
'''',
pipeline().parameters.FLAG,
'''')

@concat('select *  FROM config.Pipelines_Config where sourcecode=','''',
pipeline().parameters.SOURCE_CODE,'''',
'and ActiveFlag=',
'''',
pipeline().parameters.FLAG,
'''')

@concat('select COUNT(RunningStatus) AS CNT,RunningStatus  FROM config.Pipelines_Config where sourcecode=','''',
pipeline().parameters.sourcecode,'''',
'and ActiveFlag=',
'''',
pipeline().parameters.flag,
'''',
'GROUP BY RunningStatus 
having COUNT(RunningStatus)>0')

ifTrueActivities.name: another batch in progress OR FAILED
